reviews.review:
[h1]Half-Life 2: Lost Coast[/h1]
Прошел я [b]Half-Life 2: Lost Coast[/b] за 20 мин.
Это краткая техно-[b]демка[/b] по функции HDR и в тоже время вырезанная глава в основной игре Half-Life 2 
в которой мы встречаем Рыбака.
В целом для ознакомление.
Фанатам вселенной зайдет.
Cyberpunk sit down.
Short but it's ok
what do you expect it's a tech demo
Half Life 2 Lost Coast это тест модифицированного движка Source, мы играем на карте ремейке вырезанного уровня из беты Халф Лайф 2. Это всё что я могу сказать.
short but gold
ARG to bad

A short, but great missing level from Half-Life 2. It's interesting to hear the developers talking about it and the map is very pleasant to look at. If you have some time to spare I say this is a nice experience. It's only 20 minutes long after all. It comes with the base game, so there is no reason not to try it.
Que bien se ve el agua
ZZZzzzz

После прохождения остался только один вопрос - Зачем? И я видел в обзорах ответ на этот вопрос - Это демка, сделали ее для того, чтобы показать на что способны hdr технологии. А почему нельзя сделать отдельную игру по мотивам оригинальной игры и продавать ее? Да хотя б выпустите ремастер оригинального hl2 с новыми технологиями, если их нет там, я думаю фанаты снова купили б этот продукт. Да, он был б такой же абсолютно, но красивый визуально, плюс такой ход позволил б завлечь новых игроков в фанбазу. 
А так мы имеем демку на 10-20 мин, в которой особо много не постреляешь, потому что создавалась видимо только для того, чтобы пробежаться посмотреть. В общем, не стоит потраченного времени.

hey its a fun little demo. graphics are neat, the 5 minutes of combat are get are as good as always. cool setting. nothing to complain about regarding the actual game, but valve should make it free, so people can play it to decide if they will buy hl2 (which you ABSOLUTELY SHOULD)

This is a tech demo for the engine improvements implemented between Half-Life 2 and its episodes. Play it to experience the full HL2 experience or skip it as it doesn't offer anything substantial gameplay wise.
Best FPS game ever

Damn. Where do I start? This game is a masterpiece. Re-Logic has put everything they have into this game and it shows. They have made eight years of content all for free! Almost no other company would do that. This game has so much content. I have beat this game at least thirty times on Mobile, Xbox, and PC and I am sure that my thirty-first time will be as fun as the first. There are countless mods like the Calamity and Thorium mods just in case you do get board. The normal mode is not easy, but it provides players with a challenge, but the expert mode provides players with a greater challenge while forcing the the player to engage with Terraria's mechanics like crafting potions, getting the best armor possible, and learning the boss's attack patterns. If you want to test your skills, this is the mode to play. Everyone should have this game on their steam library, after all it is ten bucks. I have played this by my self and with friends and both are equally as enjoyable. This game is so good the negative reviews are telling you to buy it. If you don't have this game or are not planning on getting it, than you have not seen how good gaming can be.
It good

i think it fits in right between highway 17 and sandtraps

Покупать только в паке. Просто демо с возможностями игрового движка. Интересная, но очень короткая. Из гейплея ничего абсолютно нового, только демонстрация HDR технологии, да пару игровых ситуаций интересных. Отражения воды очень классное, освещение в играх играет большую роль.

Hey, you there! Wait a minute now... aren't you? Ah, you are! You're that scientist chap — Freedman, Fishman — am I right? You must be here to take on the Combine. Not sure what one man can do, but... no other reason to visit Saint Olga at a time like this. I'll take you where they made their base — or as far as I can, at any rate.

Here, now, let me just unlock this gate for ya. Got the key ri-right here... There we go! Get along now, laddy. Destroy that gun, and no dawdling. Go on through, lad.

You did it, lad. Come on with me to Saint Olga. We'll celebrate this victory with a feast! I eh... hope you like... leeches. Hey, where you goin'? You're getting fuzzy around the edges! Well, I guess you got other places to be. Uh, nice knowin' ya!

Petit chapitre bonus de Half Life 2, un jeu très simple à speedrun, en 6 minutes ça devrait être plié, je vois pas l'intérêt de ce jeu mais c'est sympa. Pas de gros spoil, vous allez juste devoir vous infiltrer dans une base du cartel et vous enfuir, cet épisode est sorti pour faire voir aux joueur l'amélioration du moteur graphique au niveau des animations et de l'éclairage, et c'est très réussi pour un jeu qui commence à dater. Ne pouvant pas refaire tout Half Life 2, ils ont décidé de créer un petit épisode à part. Bref, c'est très cool et très rapide à finir malgré que les 3Go de DL pour 15 minutes de gameplay font un peu mal quand vous n'avez pas la fibre.
Ещё такой хуеты не видел.

Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

A cool tech demo that shows part of the original Half-Life 2 content that was cut from the original game (somewhere around Highway 17 chapters). It focus on HDR tech that was introduced later in Episode 1. It's short, but very fun (also with great vertical level design) as only Half-Life 2 can be. It's like a free bonus for Half-Life fans.

半条命2：消失的海岸，这一部是原计划半条命2里17号公路的一章，游戏内容只有一章，流程极短。
主要是向别人展示起源引擎强大的渲染功能。

可能有很多人受不了起源引擎的效果，要知道，在2002年做出这么强大的渲染和优化，可以说是直接逼死同行，这也是少见的pc游戏画质高于主机游戏的作品。

---{Para quem esse jogo foi desenvolvido?}---
( ) Crianças.
(X) Todos os públicos.
( ) Adolescentes.
( ) Adultos.
( ) Pessoas que conhecem a morte.

---{Texturas, Gráficos e Lindeza?}---
( ) Desenhado no Paint por macacos sem treino.
( ) 220 x 120p.
( ) Meia boca, tem piores.
(X) Mais ou menos.
( ) Dentro da média atual.
( ) Gráficos lindos e boa iluminação.
( ) Quase um Red Dead Redemption 2.
( ) Isso veio de outra dimensão.

---{Falhas?}---
( ) Isso é uma falha.
( ) Bug pra todo lado, tipo tiro em favela no Rio.
( ) Muita falha mas dá pra jogar.
(x) Poucos bugs.
( ) Bugs que são legais e não atrapalham.
( ) Sem falhas.
( ) Esse jogo saiu perfeito do forno.

---{É difícil?}---
( ) Basta assisitir o jogo.
( ) Requer certo uso do cérebro.
( ) Fácil de aprender / Difícil de ser o melhor.
(X) Bem desafiador, as vezes difícil.
( ) Vai dar rage, bater na mãe e se matar até conseguir ser pro.
( ) Não vai dar não.

---{Tem uma história?}---
( ) Não, um PUBG da vida.
( ) Tem história só pra não dizer que não tem.
( ) Dá pra gostar da história.
(X) Tem um historia para contexto.
( ) Consegue te arrancar uma lágrima ou duas.
( ) Dava pra fazer um livro.
( ) Nível Senhor dos anéis.
( ) Deveria constar no curriculum do Ensino médio.
( ) Melhor que graduação em uma federal.

---{Áudio e músicas?}---
( ) Nível do Funk Brasileiro.
( ) Delete a pasta de Áudio.
( ) Jogue mutado.
(X) Dá pra escutar.
( ) Os caras capricharam no áudio.
( ) Tem um som muito agradável e trilha sonora tranquila.
( ) Baixe a play list pra escutar no ônibus.
( ) Toque o tema no seu casamento.

---{Trambolho necessário pra rodar?}---
( ) Verifique se o Pc roda Paint.
(X) PC da Xuxa.
( ) PC Gamer da Casas Bahia.
( ) Um PC decente.
( ) Um PC já considerado gamer.
( ) Invista no minimo 4k em hardware.
( ) SLI de 2080ti.
( ) Esqueça, a tecnologia atual não dá conta.

Probé por primera vez este juego un 12 de febrero de 2019. y si bien en su momento al terminarlo no podía decir mucho sobre el, a día de hoy (27 de febrero de 2021) puedo decir muchas más cosas sobre esta obra. Si bien peca de tener una duración limitada, eso no quita de que sea una experiencia con una acción bastante intensa, ofreciendo bastante en muy poco tiempo; 8/10 sin lugar a dudas es una pena de que este capitulo no haya formado parte del half life 2 original, por más de que a nivel narrativo tal vez no hubiese sumado tanto eso no quita el potencial que envergaba, al ofrecer a un nuevo personaje, sumado a todo lo que anteriormente describí.
